actorId.title: Actor ID
actorId.description: Apify id of the actor to generate the README for. All necessary information will be fetched from the Actor automatically.

modelName.title: OpenAI model
modelName.description: The OpenAI model to use. Currently supported models are gpt-4o and gpt-4o-mini.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If enabled, the Actor will run in debug mode and produce more output.
